external_references.description: Insikt Group. (2025, January 9). Chinese State-Sponsored RedDelta Targeted Taiwan, Mongolia, and Southeast Asia with Adapted PlugX Infection Chain. Retrieved January 14, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) activities during [RedDelta Modified PlugX Infection Chain Operations](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0047) largely focused on ways to install a variant of [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) on victim machines.(Citation: Recorded Future RedDelta 2025)
